snippet: The longer the four Republican hopefuls battle one another, the less time the eventual nominee will have to build a war chest to compete with the advertising assault expected from President Obama's re-election team.
abstract: The longer the four Republican hopefuls battle one another, the less time the eventual nominee will have to build a war chest to compete with the advertising assault expected from President Obama's re-election team.

headline.main: Extended Race Could Pose Financial Challenges for Romney
